channel.title: shows on Javagrunt
channel.description: Recent content in shows on Javagrunt

item.title: Forked Fork for Telegraf
item.description: The work In my homelab, I’m setting up RedisTimeSeries on a Raspberry Pi. I wanted to use Telegraf to deliver metrics from the Raspberry Pi to RedisTimeSeries. There was a function fork that had already submitted a PR. The PR was started in 2019! It recently had some additional feedback added to it, so I decided to implement some of the feedback. By creating a fork of the fork and creating a PR for the PR!

item.title: Github Pages, Github Actions, and Hugo -- Rinse and Repeat
item.description: Upgrade a single page site to use Hugo One of my good friends, Charlie, is living his dream of being an actor in Hollywood. We are both enjoying our career journeys. Charlie’s career is about to skyrocket. I spoke to Charlie earlier in the day, and had him look at Hugo themes. I also invited Josh to join in and do the same. The plan was to upgrade both of their websites from single page to using Hugo.

item.title: Github Pages, Github Actions, and Hugo
item.description: Making a Hugo site for Github Pages Make javagrunt.github.io Add CNAME for javagrunt.com Setup CNAME at registrar Make a private source repository Create a hugo site, using ‘codex’ theme git clone git@github.com:javagrunt/javagrunt-hugo-src.git hugo new site javagrunt-hugo-src/ --force git submodule add https://github.com/jakewies/hugo-theme-codex.git themes/hugo-theme-codex Add a blog post (this one) hugo new blog/hugo.md Create a Github action to deploy the site https://github.

item.title: Azure, Terraform, and Redis
item.description: Using Terraform to Deploy to Terraform Cloud In a previous life, I used CredHub in my home, to keep all of my credentials and secrets safe. I want to do as much in Terraform as possible. This was me just practicing using Terraform to create/destroy workspaces. Archive

item.title: PR for redistimeseries-js issue 17
item.description: My friend, Dustin, has been doing to really cool stuff with RedisTimeSeries. He realized the new RedisTimeSeries features weren’t implemented in the client library he was using. I took a look at the library, and decided to create a PR. The issue had already been opened, so I went to work. Forked the repository, kept notes, asked for feedback. It was fun. Met HermitCode, lusket, siddhant_24 Archive
